column4: So, anyone know why MP3 Stream playback in RB is now not working on Dapper when it was working before? I have all the relevant stuff installed. Yes, I've read the FAQ. Is this a well-known problem or something unique to me?????
probably unique to you ;) you have gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly installed?
Yes, I have "gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly" installed. It WAS working great for last couple of months. Now....Kaput!
hm, I'm not much of a sound guru, but do you have sound otherwise?
